Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Southbound Reroute near North Blvd/Forest Ave
ShortDescription: Southbound 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: # 79 79thTemporary Reroute at 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski and 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski, then resume their normal route on 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red, Yellow, & Purple Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Red, Yellow, & Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red, Yellow, & Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area.

  • Purple Line shuttles buses are available between Howard and Linden in both directions.
  • The #97 Skokie is available as an alternative service for Yellow Line service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #151 Sheridan, #22 Clark and #97 Skokie. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
